channel.title: Ubisoft, i am once again dissapointed.
channel.description:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bxd96qRa6wY&feature=player_embedded#at=69']Ubisoft - We Dare (trailer)[/url]
Fine, cancel True Crime... I guess Guitar Here was old enough too... but FOR THIS?!
this might be the worst video game of all time.

item.title: Ubisoft, i am once again dissapointed.

item.description:

item.title: Ubisoft, i am once again dissapointed.
item.dc:creator: taxi_evil
item.description:
Sexy Ubisoft Wii game slammed by outraged parents and MP Keith Vaz/

Turns out putting a massive ‘12+’ on the cover wasn’t the best marketing decision ever.

It’s about as arousing as bread. I can sort of see what they’re trying to do, but… maybe more thought is needed

Read full topic

item.title: Ubisoft, i am once again dissapointed.
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
How dare they make Barbie’s Princess Land.

I’m actually kind of in admiration of their slyness; they made an extremely raunchy game, and yet they legitimately manage to make it just 12+.

Unfortunately, if you can manage to get two mildly good-looking guys and girls in the same room, it’s not gonna be that much better just because you have a game.

Read full topic
